statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model="$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name' 2>/dev/null || echo 'Claude')"; cwd="$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir' 2>/dev/null || echo '.')"; branch="$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo '')"; if [ -n "$branch" ]; then printf '\e[36m%s\e[0m in \e[33m%s\e[0m on \e[32m%s\e[0m' "$model" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$branch"; else printf '\e[36m%s\e[0m in \e[33m%s\e[0m' "$model" "$(basename "$cwd")"; fi
